vanced.changelog:
This is an unofficial version and is in beta! 

- Bumped base 
- Removed "Under player" and "Both" from the button position options 
- Restore some XGlobals values to fix HDR settings (test required) 
- Restore some AndroidManifest values to fix the installation problem of armeabi-v7a architecture (test required) 
- Supports all 74 language packs even in the ROOT version 

KNOWN ISSUES: 
- RYD does not work 
- HDR Brightness setting not being applied properly (on some devices) 
- For NON-ROOT version, microg must be installed
